name: Mist Mobility Potion

details.description: Movement Speed in fractals is increased by 5% per stack. Endurance recharge rate in fractals is increased by 10% per stack.

description:
Increases movement speed in the Fractals of the Mists. Stacks up to 5 times.
With Fractal Attunement Mastery, converts a portion of your agony resistance to concentration.

This will replace the appearance of any back item and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe. 

This backpack skin has no stats of its own.

description: Use to construct a guild siege golem build site. It has a lower supply cost than the alpha siege golem. Range 225. Requires 50 supply to complete.

name: Mini Professor Mew
description:
Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.
Combine 3 of this miniature with a Pile of Crystalline Dust, an Obsidian Shard, and an Amber Quantic Dipole (dropped by creatures in scale 1–20 fractals) in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Mister Mittens.
